code: export var validRequired=function validRequired(){var value=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:"";return!!value.trim().length;};export var validTime=function validTime(){var value=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:"";return value.replace(/\s|\_/g,'').length-2===6;};export var getTime=function getTime(){var value=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:"";var hmsArray=value.split(":");return+hmsArray[0]*60*60+ +hmsArray[1]*60+ +hmsArray[2];};export var validImageURL=function validImageURL(){var url=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:"";return url.match(/\.(jpeg|jpg|gif|png)/)!==null;};export var validVideoURL=function validVideoURL(){var url=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:"";return url.match(/\.mp4/)!=null;};export var parseFormtoPlaylist=function parseFormtoPlaylist(value){return{endTime:getTime(value.endTime),id:String(Date.now()),image:value.image,src:value.video,startTime:getTime(value.startTime),tags:value.tags,title:value.title};};
